title: Seekers Alliance - 💡│faqs
html:
# FAQs 

1️⃣ **What is Seekers Alliance?**
Seekers Alliance is a first-of-its-kind, Web3-native trading card game (TCG) with strong network effects and huge jackpots!!!

2️⃣ **When will the game be released?**
The game is currently under development. We will update the community when it is ready, but our target is sometimes late 2024. 

3️⃣ **Which platforms will Seekers Alliance release on?**
Seekers Alliance will first release as a browser game so that players can use Window, Mac, or mobile devices to play. We also have plans to launch dedicated mobile apps for Apple and Android in the future. Our vision is to allow everyone to play!

4️⃣ **Do I need a Web3 wallet to play?**
Players do not need a Web3 wallet to start playing the game, but will need to have a Web3 wallet if you want to move your assets.

title: Seekers Alliance - 💡│faqs
html:
## 👥 About Community Mods 👥
We welcome volunteers as community mods. Highest-performing mods will get premium access to the Seekers Alliance game and free NFTs. (But since we're just starting up, we will let you know when it's time to recruit mods.)

*2023/12/26 00:00 - 2024/01/26 00:00 GMT*

This Galxe survey task will be uploaded to Galxe every Thursday UTC. #🎟│open-a-ticket  and let us know if you’re not listed after the update. We're happy to help!
